Determine variable's political level(s)

Source: R/fokus.gen.R
v_lvls.Rd

Determines a variable's political level(s).

v_lvls(v_name)

Arguments

v_name

Variable name. A character scalar.

Value

A character vector of political levels, of length 0 if no specific levels could be determined.

Details

Note that the political levels are determined by simply parsing v_name.

See also

Other variable-related functions: is_skill_question_v(), shorten_v_names(), v_lbl(), v_proposal_nr(), v_skill_question_nr()

Examples

fokus::v_lvls("skill_question_1_cantonal_proposal_1")
#> [1] "cantonal"
